name: My First FPS (Elvin04)
description:
Hello, 

I present you my first game made on unity at La Horde school. The game was made in one week, our main objectives for the game were :

- Set up the mechanics of a simple FPS

- Add static targets

- Add dynamic targets

- Implement the friendly fire

- (optional) display useful data on a UI

I specify it here as it is not indicated in the game: 

- the moves are done with ZQSD

- Aiming : right click of the mouse

- Shoot : left click of the mouse

- Sprint : Left Shift

- Reload : R

The assets and sounds were mainly priced on the asset store of unity and on youtube.

Thanks to all who will read and download the game.

Thanks

Elvin
